pages.text: A mystical fluid infused with life essence. Living Terra is a rare liquid created through special processes, radiating with vital energy.

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: Living Terra exhibits unique properties:$(br2)$(li)Flows like water$(li)Glows with inner light$(li)Can be collected in buckets$(li)Used in advanced blood magic$(br2)This fluid represents the positive aspect of life force, contrasting sharply with the corruption of $(l:animus:blocks/antilife_fluid)AntiLife$().
